languages.text: "Есть и еще один кандидат, старец Инокрант, но за ним совсем мало голосов паствы. Инокрант принадлежит к мальпийцам и принят в Орден совсем недавно. Братия предполагает, что на посту настоятеля он не будет слишком усердствовать в деле поиска святынь, а наоборот, будет проповедовать благодать неведания и препятствования постижению мудрости святого Когнация".

"There is another candidate as well — Elder Inocrant, but his flock is very small. Inocrant belongs to the Malpians and was recently accepted into the Order. The priesthood assumes that, as the prelate, he would not push hard for the searching of shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance, hindering the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."
languages.original_text: "Есть и еще один кандидат, старец Инокрант, но за ним совсем мало голосов паствы. Инокрант принадлежит к мальпийцам и принят в Орден совсем недавно. Братия предполагает, что на посту настоятеля он не будет слишком усердствовать в деле поиска святынь, а наоборот, будет проповедовать благодать неведания и препятствования постижению мудрости святого Когнация".

traits.locale_text: "There is another candidate as well — Elder Enocrant, but his flock is very small. Enocrant belongs to the Malfesians and was recently accepted into the Order. The brotherhood assumes that, as an abbot, he would not be too keen on the search for shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance and hinder the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."

The brotherhood assumes that, as an abbot, he would not be too keen on the search for shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance and hinder the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."

The brotherhood assumes that, as an abbot, he would not push hard for the searching of shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance, hindering the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."

"There is another candidate as well — Elder Inocrant, but his flock is very small. Inocrant belongs to the Malpians and was recently accepted into the Order. The priesthood assumes that, as the prelate, he would not push hard for the searching of shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance, hindering the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."

"There is another candidate as well — Elder Inocrant, but his flock is very small. Inocrant belongs to the Malpians and was recently accepted into the Order. The priesthood assumes that, as the prelate, he would not push hard for the searching of shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance, hindering the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."

languages.text: “还有另一位候选人，是伊诺柯兰特长老，但他的信众很少。伊诺柯兰特是马尔皮人，最近才加入了修会。修会认为，如果他当上了教长，恐怕不会致力于寻找神龛的，相反，他会宣扬无知之福，阻碍对圣科尼亚蒂乌斯智慧的理解。”
languages.original_text: "There is another candidate as well — Elder Inocrant, but his flock is very small. Inocrant belongs to the Malpians and was recently accepted into the Order. The priesthood assumes that, as the prelate, he would not push hard for the searching of shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance, hindering the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."

traits.locale_text: “还有另一位候选人，是伊诺柯兰特长老，但他的信众很少。伊诺柯兰特是马尔皮人，最近才加入了修会。修会认为，如果他当上了教长，恐怕不会致力于寻找神龛的，相反，他会宣扬无知之福，阻碍对圣科尼亚蒂乌斯智慧的理解。”

languages.text: «También hay otro candidato: el anciano Inocrant, pero su rebaño es muy pequeño. Inocrant pertenece a los malpianos y se le aceptó hace poco en la Orden. La hermandad supone que, como prelado, no insistiría en la búsqueda de santuarios, sino que, por el contrario, predicaría la bendición de la ignorancia, lo que entorpecería la comprensión de la sabiduría de san Cognatius».
languages.original_text: "There is another candidate as well — Elder Inocrant, but his flock is very small. Inocrant belongs to the Malpians and was recently accepted into the Order. The priesthood assumes that, as the prelate, he would not push hard for the searching of shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance, hindering the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."

traits.locale_text: «También hay otro candidato: el anciano Inocrant, pero su rebaño es muy pequeño. Inocrant pertenece a los malpianos y se le aceptó hace poco en la Orden. La hermandad supone que, como prelado, no insistiría en la búsqueda de santuarios, sino que, por el contrario, predicaría la bendición de la ignorancia, lo que entorpecería la comprensión de la sabiduría de san Cognatius».

languages.text: 「もう一人の候補...長老イノクラントもいるが、彼の支持者層は非常に少ない状態です。イノクラントはマルピ人に属し、最近、この修道会に受け入れられました。聖職たちは、司教である彼が聖堂の探索を強く推し進めることなく、むしろ余計な詮索を戒め、聖コグナティウスの知恵の理解を妨げるのではないかと推測しています」
languages.original_text: "There is another candidate as well — Elder Inocrant, but his flock is very small. Inocrant belongs to the Malpians and was recently accepted into the Order. The priesthood assumes that, as the prelate, he would not push hard for the searching of shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance, hindering the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."

traits.locale_text: 「もう一人の候補...長老イノクラントもいるが、彼の支持者層は非常に少ない状態です。イノクラントはマルピ人に属し、最近、この修道会に受け入れられました。同胞団は、修道院長である彼が聖堂の探索を強く推し進めることなく、反対に知らぬが仏の教えを説き、聖コグナティウスの知恵の理解を妨げるのではないかと推測しています」
「もう一人の候補...長老イノクラントもいるが、彼の支持者層は非常に少ない状態です。イノクラントはマルピ人に属し、最近、この修道会に受け入れられました。同胞団は、修道院長である彼が聖堂の探索を強く推し進めることなく、反対に知らぬが仏の教えを説き、聖コグナティウスの知恵の理解を妨げるのではないかと推測しています」

languages.text: « Il existe également un autre candidat, le doyen Inocrant, mais il rassemble bien peu de suffrages. Il appartient aux Malpiens qui n'ont été intronisés au sein de l'Ordre que très récemment. Le clergé estime qu'une fois devenu prélat, il ne soutiendrait guère la recherche des sanctuaires, mais prêcherait au contraire la béatitude de l'ignorance, entravant ainsi la pleine compréhension des sages enseignements de Saint Cognatius. »
languages.original_text: "There is another candidate as well — Elder Inocrant, but his flock is very small. Inocrant belongs to the Malpians and was recently accepted into the Order. The priesthood assumes that, as the prelate, he would not push hard for the searching of shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance, hindering the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."

traits.locale_text: « Il existe également un autre candidat, le doyen Inocrant, mais il rassemble bien peu de suffrages. Il appartient aux Malpiens qui n'ont été intronisés au sein de l'Ordre que très récemment. Le clergé estime qu'une fois devenu prélat, il ne soutiendrait guère la recherche des sanctuaires, mais prêcherait au contraire la béatitude de l'ignorance, entravant ainsi la pleine compréhension des sages enseignements de Saint Cognatius. »

languages.text: "Es gibt noch einen weiteren Kandidaten ... den Ältesten Inocrant, doch seine die Schar seiner Anhänger ist sehr klein. Inocrant gehört den Malpianern an und wurde kürzlich in den Orden aufgenommen. Die Priesterschaft geht davon aus, dass er als Prälat nicht auf die Suche nach Schreinen drängen würde, sondern im Gegenteil die Glückseligkeit des Unwissens predigen würde, was wiederum das Verständnis der Weisheit des Heiligen Cognatius behindern würde."
languages.original_text: "There is another candidate as well — Elder Inocrant, but his flock is very small. Inocrant belongs to the Malpians and was recently accepted into the Order. The priesthood assumes that, as the prelate, he would not push hard for the searching of shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance, hindering the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt noch einen weiteren Kandidaten ... den Ältesten Inocrant, doch seine die Schar seiner Anhänger ist sehr klein. Inocrant gehört den Malpianern an und wurde kürzlich in den Orden aufgenommen. Die Priesterschaft geht davon aus, dass er als Prälat nicht auf die Suche nach Schreinen drängen würde, sondern im Gegenteil die Glückseligkeit des Unwissens predigen würde, was wiederum das Verständnis der Weisheit des Heiligen Cognatius behindern würde."

"Es gibt noch einen weiteren Kandidaten, den Ältesten Inocrant, doch seine die Schar seiner Anhänger ist sehr klein. Inocrant gehört den Malpianern an und wurde kürzlich in den Orden aufgenommen. Die Bruderschaft geht davon aus, dass er als Abt nicht auf die Suche nach Schreinen drängen würde, sondern im Gegenteil die Glückseligkeit des Unwissens predigen würde, was das Verständnis der Weisheit des Heiligen Cognatius behindern würde."

languages.text: "Bir aday daha var: İhtiyar İnocrant. Ancak onun cemaati oldukça küçüktür. İnocrant, Malpililerden biridir ve kısa süre önce Tarikat'a kabul edilmiştir. Rahiplik, onun bir piskopos olarak mabetleri aramaya çok fazla özen göstermeyeceğini, bunun yerine cehaletin mutluluğunu yücelteceğini ve bu sebepten Aziz Cognatius'un bilgeliğinin idrakini engelleyeceğini varsaymaktadır."
languages.original_text: "There is another candidate as well — Elder Inocrant, but his flock is very small. Inocrant belongs to the Malpians and was recently accepted into the Order. The priesthood assumes that, as the prelate, he would not push hard for the searching of shrines, but, on the contrary, would preach the bliss of ignorance, hindering the comprehension of Saint Cognatius's wisdom."
